pages.text: .space-container { position: relative; min-height: 70vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; text-align: center; overflow: hidden; padding: 20px; } .stars { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; pointer-events: none; z-index: 0; } .star { position: absolute; background: #fff; border-radius: 50%; opacity: 0; animation: twinkle 4s infinite; } @keyframes twinkle { 0% { opacity: 0; } 50% { opacity: 1; } 100% { opacity: 0; } } .planet { width: 180px; height: 180px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #3dd9b6, #2092ec); border-radius: 50%; position: relative; box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(32, 146, 236, 0.5); margin-bottom: 40px; overflow: hidden; animation: rotate 30s linear infinite; } .planet::after { content: ''; position: absolute; top: -10px; left: -40px; width: 60px; height: 60px; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); border-radius: 50%; box-shadow: 40px 20px 0 -10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2), 100px -30px 0 -5px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1), -40px 80px 0 -8px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2), 140px 120px 0 -12px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); } .astronaut { position: absolute; width: 80px; height: 80px; top: -100px; left: calc(50% - 40px); animation: float 6s ease-in-out infinite; z-index: 2; } .astronaut i { font-size: 60px; background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ff5722, #ff9800); -webkit-background-clip: text; background-clip: text; color: transparent; filter: drop-shadow(0 0 10px rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.7)); } .error-number { font-size: 120px; font-weight: bold; margin: 0; background: linear-gradient(45deg, #3dd9b6, #2092ec); -webkit-background-clip: text; background-clip: text; color: transparent; text-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); animation: pulse 3s ease-in-out infinite; position: relative; z-index: 2; } .error-text { font-size: 24px; color: #555; margin: 20px 0 40px; max-width: 600px; position: relative; z-index: 2; } .return-button { position: relative; z-index: 2; display: inline-block; background: linear-gradient(45deg, #3dd9b6, #2092ec); color: #fff; padding: 15px 35px; border-radius: 50px; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: none; box-shadow: 0 5px 20px rgba(61, 217, 182, 0.4); transition: all 0.3s ease; overflow: hidden; } .return-button:hover { transform: translateY(-5px); box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(61, 217, 182, 0.5); } .return-button::after { content: ''; position: absolute; top: -50%; left: -50%; width: 200%; height: 200%; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); transform: rotate(45deg); transition: all 0.3s ease; } .return-button:hover::after { left: 100%; } .ufo { position: absolute; top: 10%; right: 10%; font-size: 40px; z-index: 1; animation: float-ufo 15s linear infinite; } .ufo i { color: #ff9800; filter: drop-shadow(0 0 10px rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.5)); } @keyframes rotate { from { transform: rotate(0deg); } to { transform: rotate(360deg); } } @keyframes float { 0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0) rotate(3deg);
